WorkItem.ClosedComment: Read the version notes for 4.1.03Rawr.ProtWarr:- Fix for Issue 20405: Survivability significantly higher in this release - The Damage Taken multipliers were not being applied properly due to previous bad handling in two places and only one of those places having been fixed in last release- Minor clean-ups following issue 20405- Fix for issue 20324 (stacking trinket procs are non-functional)That's why
WorkItem.Description:
I often use the Upgrade List because it gives me a very good and structural overview over my possible upgrades. But since 4.1.03 every time I create an Upgrade List the list shows me "upgrades" which are definitly not upgrade for me because the actual equipped item is very very better.
 
I'm not quite sure if this is something like a new "feature" which I maybe don't unterstand or a real issue but I find it really confusing.
 
Attaching my character file and the build upgrade list.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Build Upgrade List doesn't work correctly since 4.1.03

Comments.Message: We need more specific information. You say some items are upgrades and others aren't... which items?

You can see it on the upgrade list. The marked items are the items which I've got and with which I did an optimization just before. Before the patch I didn't see my marked items because they were the best items which I had at the moment for this slot. Now there are a lot of items in the upgrade table which are worse than my equiped items (=the highest item with the green diamant in the table)
